intro: Jasione cornuta, commonly known as the horned jasione, is a flowering plant native to Europe and parts of Asia. It belongs to the family Caryophyllaceae, which includes many ornamental and medicinal plants. The plant features slender stems and small, delicate flowers that are typically pink or white in color. Its leaves are opposite and lance-shaped, with a slightly hairy texture. Jasione cornuta is often found in meadows and rocky areas, thriving in well-drained soils.
